Text: Could you please upload John Ford's Fort Apache (which has a Blu-Ray scene release that is not on TPB, for whatever reason) and She Wore a Yellow Ribbon? The qualities of various rips on TPB of those two films are absolutely tedious, at least compared to the qualities of films you put out. Thanks btw for your work, I've probably downloaded 50% of your torrents.
Thank you. May I request for the 1952 film "5 Fingers" starring James Mason? Please please please??? Thank you.
